line_1: Project long Shadows o'er the Chrystal Tyde.
line_2: Behold! th' ascending Villa's on my Side

line_1: Whole Nations enter with each swelling Tyde,
line_2: And Oceans join whom they did first divide;

line_1: Then Ships of uncouth Form shall stem the Tyde,
line_2: And Feather'd People crowd my wealthy Side,

line_1: Bursts out, resistless, with a thund'ring Tyde!
line_2: And never shock'd, and never turn'd aside,

line_1: Sorrow o'erwhelm'd us like a rising Tyde,
line_2: So, when the beautious, fair Maria dy'd,

line_1: And China's Earth receives the smoking Tyde.
line_2: From silver Spouts the grateful Liquors glide,
The Captive Generals to his Carr are ty'd:
Echoing his Glory, gratify his Pride.
